article:
The 'Metropolitan Opera House' may refer to:

*Metropolitan Opera or "the Met", the famed opera company in New York City
*Metropolitan Opera House (39th St), "the old Met" was the first home of the
Metropolitan Opera *Metropolitan Opera House (Lincoln Center), the current home
of the Metropolitan Opera *Metropolitan Opera House (Grand Forks, North Dakota),
a historic opera house in Grand Forks, North Dakota *Metropolitan Opera House
(Iowa Falls, Iowa), a historic opera house in Iowa Falls *Metropolitan Opera
House (Minneapolis, Minnesota), a historic opera house in Minneapolis
*Metropolitan Opera House (Philadelphia), a historic opera house in Philadelphia
*Metropolitan Opera House (Saint Paul, Minnesota), a historic opera house in
Saint Paul *Metropolitan Opera House (Taichung, Taiwan), an opera house
currently under construction in Taichung
